css.color: mbr-flex mbr-jc-c  flex-wrap grid-column mbr-align-item-c container

itemList.heading: Power Chill Operation
itemList.caption: Cool down your home at a fast rate. Daikin's Power Chill operation cools down 20% faster as compared to the normal mode. It ensures your room temperature drops rapidly for immediate relief from the hot temperature outside.

itemList.heading: Power-Airflow Dual Flaps
itemList.caption: The Power-Airflow Dual Flaps along with the Crossflow Evaporator fans ensure even distribution of cool air in both small and large spaces, making sure you are comfortable at all times.

itemList.heading: 10 Years Warranty on Compressor
itemList.caption: Enjoy long term assurance with 10 Years of peaceful cooling at your house. Daikin provides you tension-free comfort for a decade with a warranty on your air conditioning system's compressor.

itemList.heading: 3D Airflow
itemList.caption: Enjoy uniform cooling at every corner. Daikin’s 3-D ensures steady air circulation to deliver even cooling and unmatched comfort. The flap and louver move in tandem with each other to circulate the air in the entire room.

itemList.heading: 10 Years Warranty on PCB
itemList.caption: Want additional peace of mind? With Daikin's 5 year warranty on PCB, make your experience more peaceful alongside extra assurance on the maintenance cost and enjoy smooth cooling of your AC in your home.

itemList.heading: Air Throw 16* Meters (52 Feet)
itemList.caption:
With the Cross Flow Evaporator Fans, Daikin air conditioners' every product is perfected and re-perfected to ensure they deliver and carry the badge of trust. Air flow upto 16* metres (52 feet) away from the unit ensures uniform and powerful cooling.

Air throw given for 5.28KW (1.5 TR) capacity, may vary model to model

itemList.heading: Anti Corrosion Treatment
itemList.caption: Live a worry-free life with Daikin's Anti Corrosion Treatment. Daikin ACs come with a special coating which prevents the rusting of the copper coil, thus, ensuring a long life of your device and eliminating your trouble.

itemList.heading: Coanda Airflow
itemList.caption: Make way for effective air circulation and efficient temperature distribution with Daikin’s Coanda airflow, designed to give the best air-conditioning experience. This function ensures cooling even in corners of the room by streaming cool air upwards along the ceiling, avoiding furniture or obstructions.

itemList.heading: Cools upto 54º C
itemList.caption: Unlike most regular air conditioners that are designed to deliver cooling at 35ºC, Daikin air conditioners are designed to perform at extreme ambient conditions as high as 54ºC. This makes them the ideal choice for dry and tropical countries.

itemList.heading: Dew Clean Technology#
itemList.caption:
Daikin’s Dew Clean Technology auto-cleans the indoor heat exchanger unit, getting rid of bacteria, moulds and other unwanted particles. It ensures odour-free, fresh, consistent airflow at all times.

#Dew Clean Technology is available in cooling only mode.

itemList.heading: Econo Mode
itemList.caption: Set the limit for power consumption with Daikin's ECONO mode feature. This function enables efficient operation by limiting the maximum power consumption. Taking one step towards Daikin's future innovation.

itemList.heading: Good Sleep Off Timer
itemList.caption: Assure comfortable sleep by preventing excessive cooling of the room with a temperature shift value setting. The set temperature increases by 0.5°C at 30-minute intervals, giving you a better experience.

itemList.heading: Heating & Cooling Function Operation -10°C to 54°C
itemList.caption: Keeps the ambient temperature comfortable in both chilled winters and harsh summers. It cools when the temperature is hot outside and warms when the surroundings are uncomfortably chilled for you.

itemList.heading: Patented Swing Compressor
itemList.caption: Daikin Air conditioners come with a Patented Swing Compressor which decreases friction and vibration. This helps in a smooth rotation of the swing compressor which provides a quiet and efficient operation.

itemList.heading: PM 2.5 Filter
itemList.caption: Live life pollutants free with Daikin's highly efficient air conditioner. The PM2.5 air conditioner filter traps fine air particles 2.5 microns in width, giving you a clean and healthy indoor air.

itemList.heading: Power Chill Operation
itemList.caption: Cool down your home at a fast rate. Daikin's Power Chill operation cools down 20% faster as compared to the normal mode. It ensures your room temperature drops rapidly for immediate relief from the hot temperature outside.

itemList.heading: Power-Airflow Dual Flaps
itemList.caption: The Power-Airflow Dual Flaps along with the Crossflow Evaporator fans ensure even distribution of cool air in both small and large spaces, making sure you are comfortable at all times.
